TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INameScope

summary.span: 定義合約說明項目名稱應該如何在特定的 XAML 名稱範圍內存取，以及如何在該 XAML 名稱範圍內強制執行名稱的唯一性。

span.span: Defines a contract for how names of elements should be accessed within a particular XAML namescope, and how to enforce uniqueness of names within that XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個介面是由具有要重複使用透過範本或延遲的字眼的子元素的類別。This interface is implemented by classes that have child elements that are intended to be reused through the template or defer metaphor. 範本、 處理站和類似的建構必須有唯一的 XAML 名稱範圍與主要物件圖形中，XAML 的根目錄。Templates, factories and similar constructs must have unique XAML namescopes that are separate from a main object graph and root XAML. 這裡的原則就是必須有名稱衝突引入應用程式的物件圖形，從這些子項目所建立的物件時，並讓 DOM 作業和依賴名稱識別項的 XAML 參考技術可以依賴名稱每個 XAML 名稱範圍中的唯一性。The principle here is that there should be no name collisions when objects created from those child elements are introduced to an application's object graph, and so that DOM operations and XAML reference techniques that rely on the name identifier can rely on name uniqueness in each XAML namescope. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個介面會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes WPF 類別會實作這個介面。This interface is implemented by the WPF class . 在大部分的 XAML 名稱範圍作業[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]的運作方式為使用執行個體，但資訊偶爾溝通內部使用參考。Most XAML namescope operations in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] operate by using instances, but information is occasionally communicated internally by using references. 使用處理站或延遲結合 XAML 表示的字眼 WPF 類別的範例包括和。Examples of WPF classes that use a factory or defer metaphor combined with XAML representation are and . 這些實作通常依賴從可用的介面方法的明確版本類別。These implementations usually rely on the explicit versions of the interface methods available from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object FindName(string name) cil managed
Public Function FindName (name As String) As Object

param.name: name
param.span: 所要求之物件的名稱識別項。

span.span: The name identifier for the object being requested.

summary.span: 傳回具有所提供之識別名稱的物件。

span.span: Returns an object that has the provided identifying name.

returns.span: 如果找不到該名稱的物件，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if no object of that name was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML 標記中的有效名稱字串必須符合中所述的需求[XamlName 文法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。Valid name strings in XAML markup must match the requirements documented in [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterName (string name, object scopedElement);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterName(string name, object scopedElement) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterName (name As String, scopedElement As Object)
public: void RegisterName(System::String ^ name, System::Object ^ scopedElement);

param.name: scopedElement
param.span: 所提供 name 參考的特定項目。

span.span: The specific element that the provided name refers to.

summary.span: 將提供的名稱註冊到目前的 XAML 名稱範圍中。

span.span: Registers the provided name into the current XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不允許在 XAML 名稱範圍中有重複的名稱。Duplicate names in a XAML namescope are not permitted.

span.span: Do not permit duplicate names to be registered.

para.span: 如果輸入已指派給現有的項目在 XAML 名稱範圍的內部集合表示法 (即使它是與相同)，會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If the input is already assigned to an existing element in the internal collection representation of the XAML namescope (even if it is the same as ), throw an exception.

para.span: 也請考慮擲回例外狀況，如果所提供的名稱不符合[XamlName 文法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。

span.span: Also consider throwing an exception if the provided name does not conform to [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UnregisterName(string name) cil managed

summary.span: 從目前的 XAML Namescope 中，取消註冊所提供的名稱。

span.span: Unregisters the provided name from the current XAML namescope.

para.span: 如果輸入的名稱不存在，擲回例外狀況。

span.span: If the input name does not exist, throw an exception.

para.span: 您應該移除名稱與先前註冊的項目則是指從 XAML 名稱範圍的集合表示法，讓相同的名稱無法再次註冊在未來。

span.span: You should remove the name and the previously registered element it refers to from the collection representation of the XAML namescope, so that the same name could potentially be registered again in the future.
